subject: Re: [junit] Change the system time for the test
msgSnippet: ... Google Virtual Clock pattern -- J. B. (Joe) Rainsberger Diaspar Software Services http://www.diasparsoftware.com Author, JUnit Recipes: Practical Methods
messageBody:
haefeleuser wrote:
>
> For my JUnit tests I need to modify the system time.
>
> Instead of doing this manually by changing the OS clock I would like
> to change the clock programatically in Java.

Google "Virtual Clock pattern"
--
J. B. (Joe) Rainsberger
Diaspar Software Services
http://www.diasparsoftware.com
Author, JUnit Recipes: Practical Methods for Programmer Testing
